arts.ttl: Dani Carvajal suffers horror injury in Real Madrid victory
arts.sum: If Carvajal has sustained a long-term injury, Ancelotti will be able to turn to squad player Lucas Vazquez. The Spanish right-back had played the whole match as earlier goals from Federico Valverde and Vinicius Junior wrapped up the points but was left screaming in agony in second-half stoppage time after a collision with Yeremi Pino.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid 2-0 Villarreal: Player ratings as stunners earn Los Blancos victory
arts.sum: Kylian Mbappe, who's fit despite suffering a recent injury, saw a shot blocked before finding goalscorer Valverde, with the ball eventually winding up with Jude Bellingham. CM: Federico Valverde - 9/10 - Put Madrid ahead with a blockbuster hit from distance and later got the assist for Vinicius' strike.

arts.ttl: Managing Madrid Podcast: Real Madrid 2 - 0 Villarreal, Post-game, La Liga 2024 - 2025
arts.sum: On this episode of the Managing Madrid Podcast, Kiyan Sobhani and Siddharth Ramsundar discuss: It also serves as a means for Real Madrid fans to connect and discuss the team.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid stars show their support to Dani Carvajal following horror injury
arts.sum: Real Madrid managed to get a 2-0 win over the line against Villarreal on Saturday evening. One of the biggest talking points of the night was the horror injury which…

arts.ttl: Real Madrid beats Villarreal 2-0 in La Liga but loses Carvajal to leg injury
arts.sum: Celta Vigo striker Iago Aspas was sent off in a 1-0 win at last-placed Las Palmas after being issued consecutive yellow cards for protesting. Federico Valverde and Vinícius Júnior scored for the defending champions four days after they lost at Lille 1-0 in the Champions League to halt a 36-game unbeaten streak in all competitions.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid 2-0 Villarreal: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Los Blancos return to winning ways
arts.sum: Real Madrid respond to their Champions League setback last week by recording a 2-0 victory over Villarreal in La Liga.

arts.ttl: Worrying scenes for Real Madrid as Vinicius Jr. and Dani Carvajal both come off against Villarreal with injuries
arts.sum: Real Madrid secured a confident yet straightforward 2-0 win against Villarreal on Saturday evening, with Federico Valverde and Vinicius Jr. getting the goals. There were worrying scenes for Carlo Ancelotti’s…

arts.ttl: Real Madrid bounce back from Champions League defeat and sink Villarreal
arts.sum: Real Madrid moved level with rivals Barcelona, ahead of the Blaugrana's match on Sunday, by defeating Villarreal 2-0 on Saturday night. Jude Bellingham tried his luck with a shot that went wide of the goal later in the half, while Kylian Mbappe couldn't get a shot off after seemingly being played in behind the Villarreal defence.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid predicted XI vs Villarreal: Kylian Mbappe to start while Éder Militão is rested
arts.sum: Real Madrid are set to take on Villarreal on Saturday evening as they look to get back on track after a demoralising defeat against Lille in midweek European action. The…

arts.ttl: Real Madrid vs Villarreal: Preview, predictions and lineups
arts.sum: Real Madrid are aiming to close the gap on Clasico rivals Barcelona on Saturday when they face Villarreal in La Liga. Los Blancos had made an unbeaten start to the new season until a surprise defeat to French outfit Lille in the Champions League midweek.
